article_title: GOP presidential candidate Santorum pitches tax code revamp in Fort Worth
article_text:
Rick Santorum campaigns in Fort Worth

He unveils a plan to change the way Americans are taxed

Any drop in revenue would be made up by repealing Obamacare

article_metadata.title: GOP presidential candidate Santorum pitches tax code revamp in Fort Worth | The Star-Telegram

og.description: Republican presidential hopeful Rick Santorum says it’s time to revamp the country’s tax code.
